And every time I tell anybody that, they look at me like I'm fucking crazy,
translation.ko: 이 얘기를 하면 전부 날 미친 사람처럼 봐요

translation.en: 'cause that's a crazy thing to say.
And now you think I'm crazy.
translation.ko: 당신도 내가 미친 것 같죠? 우리 둘 다 여기 있잖아요

translation.en: -And we're both fucking here! -You're not crazy.
translation.ko: 당신도 내가 미친 것 같죠? 우리 둘 다 여기 있잖아요 넌 미치지 않았어

translation.en: You're not crazy.
My grandmother thought she was from the future
and nobody believed her.
-They can take us to other times. -Who can?
translation.ko: 그들이 우리를 다른 시간으로 이동시킬 수 있어 누가요?

translation.en: We're being abducted.
Oh, my God.
[Sarah] At the same time. No, no, no, no. Please listen to me.
translation.ko: 그리고 동시에... 아니, 내 말 들어 봐

translation.en: There's a white space.
There's-- There's-- There's a ramp floating over the ocean.
translation.ko: 바다에 떠다니는 경사로 같은 것도 있어

translation.en: There's-- There's-- There's the, like, fingers.
How do you know about the ramp?
[Sarah] You've seen it.
Yeah, that's the dream I have all the time.
How do you know about that?
It's not a dream.
[woman] How do you know about that dream?
How do you know about that? I've never told you that.
translation.ko: 난 얘기한 적이 없는데 어떻게 알아요?

translation.en: I believe you.
[Ethan] Well, good morning.
-Morning. -How are you feeling?
-Good. -[chuckles]
-Yeah. -Good.
I'm feeling much better having gotten some sleep.
And... I know I'm not a clone.
translation.ko: 난 복제 인간이 아니란 것도 알아요

translation.en: And I think I...
figured a lot of stuff out.
Okay.
Uh, sounds like you're making good progress.
Um... Well, um, I have some good news.
Um... You've been here almost 72 hours
and, um, Dr. Fung has decided to discharge you today.
translation.ko: 펑 박사님께서 오늘 퇴원해도 된다고 하셨어요

translation.en: -So you're gonna be going-- -I've only been here one night.
Um, well... It's been almost three days.
Um... But it's, uh...
Look, a lot of times when people come in for the first time,
their brains are adjusting for a while,
and it's not abnormal that you wouldn't remember everything, so...
That actually makes a lot of sense.
It's like how you told me yesterday that I had... met you before, a few weeks ago.
translation.ko: 어제는 그러셨잖아요 몇 주 전에 저희가 만났다고요

translation.en: I'm sorry, I didn't-- I said--
It totally works. Remember how I was telling you that
translation.ko: - 죄송한데 저는... - 확실히 말이 되네요 제가 꿈에서 만나는 남자가 있다고 했잖아요

translation.en: there was a guy I was seeing in my dream and, like, in the abductions,
translation.ko: 제가 꿈에서 만나는 남자가 있다고 했잖아요 납치당할 때 말이에요 어떤 여자애도 있었어요

translation.en: but there was a girl there, too.
translation.ko: 납치당할 때 말이에요 어떤 여자애도 있었어요

translation.en: And that girl was my roommate here, and she remembers the abductions, too,
translation.ko: 그 애가 지금 같은 방에 있어요 걔도 납치당한 걸 기억해요

translation.en: because we were both waking up, but Ron, the guy, wasn't,
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 깨어났지만 론이란 남자는 안 깨어나서

translation.en: so he doesn't remember anything.
And they brought her here from another time. So, like...
translation.ko: 여자애는 다른 시간대에서 끌려온 거예요 전부 말이 돼요 순환하듯이 계속되는 거예요

translation.en: it all makes sense, it's-- it's like a loop, it's continual.
translation.ko: 전부 말이 돼요 순환하듯이 계속되는 거예요

translation.en: It-- It-- It has to happen.
I'm not a clone.
I am my grandmother.
It's actually kinda beautiful. [chuckles]
Okay.
Um... Who's the girl that you talked to?
Do you think I imagined the girl in my room?
translation.ko: 제 방에 여자애가 있다고 상상한 것 같아요?

translation.en: No. I-- I actually don't know anything about the room assignments, I just--
translation.ko: 아뇨, 실제로 룸메이트에 관해 아무것도 몰라서요

translation.en: You know, I-- I'm here...
and, uh, I just would've hoped
translation.ko: 그러니까 다른 환자한테서 조언을 듣는 건

translation.en: that you would refrain from taking advice from other patients.
translation.ko: 그러니까 다른 환자한테서 조언을 듣는 건 자제했으면 해서요

translation.en: Well, it's not advice, it's just the truth.
Okay.
Um... Well,
this will all be in your paperwork, but I wanna highlight,
translation.ko: 전부 서류에 넣겠지만 꼭 당부할 게 있어요

translation.en: I-- I made an appointment for you, um,
over at the Fox Haven Clinic, it's on Green Street,
translation.ko: 폭스 헤이븐 병원에요 그린 스트리트에 있고 무료예요

translation.en: and, um, it's-- it's free,
and it's your choice whether you wanna go or not, but, um...
Uh, I-- I really... hope that you go.
Because I have high hopes for you.
And, uh, I'm-- I'm rooting for you, and I think it'd be very important
translation.ko: 또 응원하고요 그리고 치료 경과를 확인하는 게

translation.en: for you to follow up with that.
Thanks, Ethan.
I know what I need to do.
Well...
what is-- what is your plan?
[Cheryl] I'm not gonna pay to have them fixed,
translation.ko: 그거 고치는 데 돈 쓰긴 싫지만

translation.en: but I wanna be able to... bite off asparagus.
I can't bite asparagus 'cause it just goes right through my teeth.
translation.ko: 이 사이로 쑥 들어가니까 씹을 수가 없어

translation.en: [Joe] Well, I thought you had those, uh...
those plates put on your teeth, those-- What do you call them? Ooh, come on.
translation.ko: 이에 대는 그 판 말이야 뭐라고 부르지?

translation.en: -[Cheryl] No, the-- My mouthguard? -[Joe] Yeah.
-[Cheryl] I don't wear that. -[Joe] That's just for snoring, or...
translation.ko: - 그래 - 그거 안 써 코 골 때만 쓰는 거야?

translation.en: [softly] Hey, my girl.
Hi.
I came back for you.
My sweet girl. Look what I brought you.
Hey.
Let's go.
I'll always protect you.
I love you.
